verses.text: Praise ye the \sc Lord\sc*. Praise, O ye servants of the \sc Lord\sc*, Praise the name of the \sc Lord\sc*.
Blessed be the name of the \sc Lord\sc* From this time forth and for evermore.
From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same The \sc Lordâ€™s\sc* name \add is\add* to be praised.
The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* high above all nations, \add And\add* his glory above the heavens.
Who \add is\add* like unto the \sc Lord\sc* our God, Who dwelleth on high,
Who humbleth \add himself\add* to behold \add The things that are\add* in heaven, and in the earth?
He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, \add And\add* lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;
That \add he\add* may set \add him\add* with princes, \add Even\add* with the princes of his people.
He maketh the barren \add woman\add* to keep house, \add To be\add* a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the \sc Lord\sc*.
